sentences.english: "We need you to find someone," their leader said, his voice low.
sentences.korean: "누군가를 찾아주셔야겠습니다." 그들의 리더가 낮은 목소리로 말했다.

sentences.english: "The official patrols <word id='_eliminate' class='word-eng-link'>eliminate</word> any dissent, so we cannot <word id='_protest' class='word-eng-link'>protest</word> openly."
sentences.korean: "공식 순찰대는 어떤 반대 의견도 <word id='_eliminate' class='word-target-kr'>제거하기</word> 때문에, 우리는 공개적으로 <word id='_protest' class='word-target-kr'>항의할</word> 수 없습니다."

sentences.english: Kaelen noticed the <word id='_dorsal' class='word-eng-link'>dorsal</word> plates of a security drone glinting in the distance, a <word id='_conspicuous' class='word-eng-link'>conspicuous</word> reminder of their oppression.
sentences.korean: 카엘렌은 멀리서 반짝이는 보안 드론의 <word id='_dorsal' class='word-target-kr'>등 부분의</word> 판을 발견했는데, 그것은 그들의 억압을 <word id='_conspicuous' class='word-target-kr'>뚜렷하게</word> 상기시켜 주었다.

sentences.english: It was a <word id='_rash' class='word-eng-link'>rash</word> decision to get involved, but the feeling of <word id='_kinship' class='word-eng-link'>kinship</word> with the downtrodden was strong.
sentences.korean: 관여하기로 한 것은 <word id='_rash' class='word-target-kr'>경솔한</word> 결정이었지만, 억압받는 이들과의 <word id='_kinship' class='word-target-kr'>혈연 관계</word>와 같은 유대감은 강했다.

sentences.english: He needed to <word id='_discriminate' class='word-eng-link'>discriminate</word> between friend and foe in this city of mirrors.
sentences.korean: 그는 이 거울의 도시에서 친구와 적을 <word id='_discriminate' class='word-target-kr'>구별해야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: The city's prosperity did not <word id='_mirror' class='word-eng-link'>mirror</word> the lives of the Naturals, who were left with only the <word id='_surplus' class='word-eng-link'>surplus</word> of the elite.
sentences.korean: 도시의 번영은 엘리트들의 <word id='_surplus' class='word-target-kr'>나머지</word> 만을 남겨 받은 내추럴들의 삶을 <word id='_mirror' class='word-target-kr'>반영하지</word> 않았다.

sentences.english: The man's coat was <word id='_laden' class='word-eng-link'>laden</word> with the dust of the outer sectors.
sentences.korean: 그 남자의 코트에는 외부 구역의 먼지가 <word id='_laden' class='word-target-kr'>실려</word> 있었다.

sentences.english: They offered him a piece of scavenged <word id='_lumber' class='word-eng-link'>lumber</word> as a makeshift seat.
sentences.korean: 그들은 그에게 임시방편의 좌석으로 주워온 <word id='_lumber' class='word-target-kr'>목재</word> 조각을 제공했다.

sentences.english: Kaelen knew he had to <word id='_regain' class='word-eng-link'>regain</word> his purpose.
sentences.korean: 카엘렌은 자신의 목적을 <word id='_regain' class='word-target-kr'>되찾아야</word> 한다는 것을 알았다.

sentences.english: He had to <word id='_reinforce' class='word-eng-link'>reinforce</word> his will to fight back.
sentences.korean: 그는 맞서 싸우려는 의지를 <word id='_reinforce' class='word-target-kr'>강화해야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: He had to <word id='_swear' class='word-eng-link'>swear</word> an oath to himself to see this through.
sentences.korean: 그는 이 일을 끝까지 해내겠다고 스스로에게 <word id='_swear' class='word-target-kr'>맹세해야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: This case was <word id='_relevant_to' class='word-eng-link'>relevant to</word> his own past.
sentences.korean: 이 사건은 그 자신의 과거와 <word id='_relevant_to' class='word-target-kr'>관련되어</word> 있었다.

sentences.english: He couldn't <word id='_repent' class='word-eng-link'>repent</word> his decision later.
sentences.korean: 그는 나중에 자신의 결정을 <word id='_repent' class='word-target-kr'>후회할</word> 수 없었다.

sentences.english: He had to find a way to <word id='_soothe' class='word-eng-link'>soothe</word> the burning anger within him.
sentences.korean: 그는 내면의 불타는 분노를 <word id='_soothe' class='word-target-kr'>달래야</word> 할 방법을 찾아야 했다.

sentences.english: The city's promises would <word id='_fuse' class='word-eng-link'>fuse</word> into lies under scrutiny.
sentences.korean: 도시의 약속들은 정밀 조사 아래 거짓말로 <word id='_fuse' class='word-target-kr'>녹아내릴</word> 것이었다.

sentences.english: He had to <word id='_patch' class='word-eng-link'>patch</word> the holes in his broken life.
sentences.korean: 그는 자신의 부서진 삶의 구멍들을 <word id='_patch' class='word-target-kr'>수선해야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: The information was <word id='_obtainable' class='word-eng-link'>obtainable</word>, but at a great cost.
sentences.korean: 정보는 <word id='_obtainable' class='word-target-kr'>손에 넣을 수 있었지만</word> 큰 대가가 따랐다.

sentences.english: He saw a child's toy, its fabric torn; he wanted to <word id='_tear' class='word-eng-link'>tear</word> down the whole system.
sentences.korean: 그는 천이 찢어진 아이의 장난감을 보았다; 그는 전체 시스템을 <word id='_tear' class='word-target-kr'>찢어버리고</word> 싶었다.

sentences.english: The city had a <word id='_utilitarian' class='word-eng-link'>utilitarian</word> beauty, but it was cold and <word id='_unrelenting' class='word-eng-link'>unrelenting</word>.
sentences.korean: 그 도시는 <word id='_utilitarian' class='word-target-kr'>실용주의적인</word> 아름다움을 지녔지만, 차갑고 <word id='_unrelenting' class='word-target-kr'>무자비했다</word>.

sentences.english: The buildings were <word id='_toothed' class='word-eng-link'>toothed</word> shadows against the sky.
sentences.korean: 건물들은 하늘을 배경으로 <word id='_toothed' class='word-target-kr'>들쑥날쑥한</word> 그림자를 드리우고 있었다.

sentences.english: Their society was a fragile thing, built on a <word id='_trustworthy' class='word-eng-link'>trustworthy</word> lie that could <word id='_transform' class='word-eng-link'>transform</word> into chaos at any moment.
sentences.korean: 그들의 사회는 언제라도 혼돈으로 <word id='_transform' class='word-target-kr'>변형될</word> 수 있는 <word id='_trustworthy' class='word-target-kr'>믿을 수 있는</word> 거짓말 위에 세워진 연약한 것이었다.

sentences.english: There was a <word id='_variety' class='word-eng-link'>variety</word> of reasons to refuse, but also one compelling reason to accept.
sentences.korean: 거절할 이유는 <word id='_variety' class='word-target-kr'>다양했지만</word> 수락해야 할 강력한 이유도 하나 있었다.

sentences.english: He needed to find a specific <word id='_variety' class='word-eng-link'>variety</word> of data chip.
sentences.korean: 그는 특정 <word id='_variety' class='word-target-kr'>종류의</word> 데이터 칩을 찾아야 했다.

sentences.english: The two sides had a <word id='_mutual' class='word-eng-link'>mutual</word> enemy.
sentences.korean: 양측에게는 <word id='_mutual' class='word-target-kr'>상호간의</word> 적이 있었다.

sentences.english: He had to <word id='_recite' class='word-eng-link'>recite</word> the access codes from memory.
sentences.korean: 그는 기억에서 접속 코드를 <word id='_recite' class='word-target-kr'>암송해야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: The glands on the genetically modified creatures would <word id='_secrete' class='word-eng-link'>secrete</word> a toxin.
sentences.korean: 유전자 변형 생물체의 분비샘은 독소를 <word id='_secrete' class='word-target-kr'>분비하곤</word> 했다.

sentences.english: Kaelen knew his investigation would inevitably <word id='_arise_from' class='word-eng-link'>arise from</word> the city's darkest secrets.
sentences.korean: 카엘렌은 그의 조사가 필연적으로 도시의 가장 어두운 비밀들로부터 <word id='_arise_from' class='word-target-kr'>기인할</word> 것임을 알았다.

sentences.english: He decided to <word id='_embark_on' class='word-eng-link'>embark on</word> this perilous journey.
sentences.korean: 그는 이 위험한 여정을 <word id='_embark_on' class='word-target-kr'>시작하기로</word> 결심했다.

sentences.english: The first <word id='_barrier' class='word-eng-link'>barrier</word> was the sheer wall of silence from the authorities.
sentences.korean: 첫 번째 <word id='_barrier' class='word-target-kr'>장애물은</word> 당국의 완전한 침묵의 벽이었다.

sentences.english: He had to <word id='_commence' class='word-eng-link'>commence</word> his search in the underbelly of the city, a place few dared to tread.
sentences.korean: 그는 거의 아무도 감히 발을 들여놓지 않는 도시의 밑바닥에서 수색을 <word id='_commence' class='word-target-kr'>시작해야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: The official story was a paradox, a clear <word id='_contradiction' class='word-eng-link'>contradiction</word> of the facts he already knew.
sentences.korean: 공식적인 이야기는 그가 이미 알고 있는 사실들과 명백히 <word id='_contradiction' class='word-target-kr'>모순되는</word> 역설이었다.

sentences.english: His search for the truth would eventually <word id='_culminate' class='word-eng-link'>culminate</word> in a confrontation with the city's most powerful forces.
sentences.korean: 진실을 향한 그의 탐색은 결국 도시의 가장 강력한 세력과의 대결로 <word id='_culminate' class='word-target-kr'>끝날</word> 것이었다.

sentences.english: He began to <word id='_delineate' class='word-eng-link'>delineate</word> a map of the missing person's last known movements.
sentences.korean: 그는 실종자의 마지막 행적에 대한 지도의 <word id='_delineate' class='word-target-kr'>윤곽을 그리기</word> 시작했다.

sentences.english: The elites saw their control as a <word id='_donation' class='word-eng-link'>donation</word> to the chaotic Naturals, a gift of order.
sentences.korean: 엘리트들은 자신들의 통제를 혼란스러운 내추럴들에게 주는 질서라는 선물, 즉 <word id='_donation' class='word-target-kr'>기증으로</word> 여겼다.

sentences.english: The city's gleaming towers were built on a <word id='_foundation' class='word-eng-link'>foundation</word> of lies.
sentences.korean: 도시의 빛나는 탑들은 거짓의 <word id='_foundation' class='word-target-kr'>기초</word> 위에 세워졌다.

sentences.english: It was a <word id='_fundamental' class='word-eng-link'>fundamental</word> truth he was beginning to uncover.
sentences.korean: 그것은 그가 밝혀내기 시작한 <word id='_fundamental' class='word-target-kr'>근본적인</word> 진실이었다.

sentences.english: He found a <word id='_handful' class='word-eng-link'>handful</word> of witnesses, but they were too afraid to speak.
sentences.korean: 그는 <word id='_handful' class='word-target-kr'>소수의</word> 목격자들을 찾았지만, 그들은 너무 두려워 말을 하지 못했다.

sentences.english: The Alpha leader had reached the <word id='_height' class='word-eng-link'>height</word> of his power.
sentences.korean: 알파 지도자는 그의 권력의 <word id='_height' class='word-target-kr'>절정에</word> 달해 있었다.

sentences.english: The missing person's case was nearly <word id='_identical' class='word-eng-link'>identical</word> to another from a year ago.
sentences.korean: 그 실종 사건은 일 년 전의 다른 사건과 거의 <word id='_identical' class='word-target-kr'>동일했다</word>.

sentences.english: Every step of the investigation presented a new <word id='_impediment' class='word-eng-link'>impediment</word>.
sentences.korean: 조사의 모든 단계에서 새로운 <word id='_impediment' class='word-target-kr'>장애가</word> 나타났다.

sentences.english: He had to <word id='_justify' class='word-eng-link'>justify</word> his methods to the skeptical people who hired him.
sentences.korean: 그는 자신을 고용한 회의적인 사람들에게 자신의 방법을 <word id='_justify' class='word-target-kr'>증명해야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: He couldn't help but <word id='_lament' class='word-eng-link'>lament</word> the loss of the old world.
sentences.korean: 그는 구세계의 상실을 <word id='_lament' class='word-target-kr'>슬퍼하지</word> 않을 수 없었다.

sentences.english: A rogue scientist was rumored to be working with a dangerous <word id='_microorganism' class='word-eng-link'>microorganism</word>.
sentences.korean: 한 악당 과학자가 위험한 <word id='_microorganism' class='word-target-kr'>미생물로</word> 연구하고 있다는 소문이 돌았다.

sentences.english: Kaelen felt <word id='_moody' class='word-eng-link'>moody</word> as the rain slicked the neon-lit streets.
sentences.korean: 비가 네온 불빛 거리를 적시자 카엘렌은 <word id='_moody' class='word-target-kr'>우울함을</word> 느꼈다.

sentences.english: The <word id='_origin' class='word-eng-link'>origin</word> of the Alphas was a closely guarded secret.
sentences.korean: 알파의 <word id='_origin' class='word-target-kr'>근원은</word> 엄중히 지켜지는 비밀이었다.

sentences.english: He couldn't <word id='_predict' class='word-eng-link'>predict</word> what he would find.
sentences.korean: 그는 무엇을 찾게 될지 <word id='_predict' class='word-target-kr'>예측할</word> 수 없었다.

sentences.english: The slow <word id='_progress' class='word-eng-link'>progress</word> of his investigation was frustrating.
sentences.korean: 그의 조사의 느린 <word id='_progress' class='word-target-kr'>발전은</word> 답답했다.

sentences.english: He managed to <word id='_scoop' class='word-eng-link'>scoop</word> up a discarded data file from a public terminal.
sentences.korean: 그는 공용 단말기에서 버려진 데이터 파일을 <word id='_scoop' class='word-target-kr'>긁어 모으는</word> 데 성공했다.

sentences.english: With that file, he could <word id='_score' class='word-eng-link'>score</word> a significant victory against the corrupt system.
sentences.korean: 그 파일로 그는 부패한 시스템에 맞서 중요한 승리를 <word id='_score' class='word-target-kr'>얻을</word> 수 있었다.

sentences.english: He also found the <word id='_score' class='word-eng-link'>score</word> for a haunting melody the missing person used to hum.
sentences.korean: 그는 또한 실종자가 흥얼거리던 잊혀지지 않는 멜로디의 <word id='_score' class='word-target-kr'>악보를</word> 발견했다.

sentences.english: A <word id='_scrap' class='word-eng-link'>scrap</word> of fabric from the scene was his only physical clue.
sentences.korean: 현장에서 나온 천 <word id='_scrap' class='word-target-kr'>파편이</word> 그의 유일한 물리적 단서였다.

sentences.english: He felt <word id='_singularly' class='word-eng-link'>singularly</word> responsible for the outcome.
sentences.korean: 그는 결과에 대해 <word id='_singularly' class='word-target-kr'>각별히</word> 책임감을 느꼈다.

sentences.english: He needed a <word id='_skilled' class='word-eng-link'>skilled</word> hacker to decrypt the file.
sentences.korean: 그 파일을 해독하기 위해서는 <word id='_skilled' class='word-target-kr'>숙련된</word> 해커가 필요했다.

sentences.english: The word 'hope' seemed to <word id='_stem' class='word-eng-link'>stem</word> from a forgotten language.
sentences.korean: '희망'이라는 단어는 잊혀진 언어에서 <word id='_stem' class='word-target-kr'>유래한</word> 것 같았다.

sentences.english: The roots of the conspiracy were like a tough <word id='_stem' class='word-eng-link'>stem</word>, hard to cut.
sentences.korean: 음모의 뿌리는 자르기 힘든 단단한 <word id='_stem' class='word-target-kr'>어간과</word> 같았다.

sentences.english: The government tried to <word id='_stem' class='word-eng-link'>stem</word> the flow of unauthorized information.
sentences.korean: 정부는 승인되지 않은 정보의 흐름을 <word id='_stem' class='word-target-kr'>막으려</word> 했다.

sentences.english: He had to <word id='_subdue' class='word-eng-link'>subdue</word> a guard to gain access to a restricted area.
sentences.korean: 그는 제한 구역에 접근하기 위해 경비원을 <word id='_subdue' class='word-target-kr'>정복해야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: The powerful corporations <word id='_subsidize' class='word-eng-link'>subsidize</word> the Alpha's control.
sentences.korean: 강력한 기업들은 알파의 통제를 <word id='_subsidize' class='word-target-kr'>후원한다</word>.

sentences.english: There was no <word id='_unanimity' class='word-eng-link'>unanimity</word> among the rebels; their factions were divided.
sentences.korean: 반란군 사이에는 <word id='_unanimity' class='word-target-kr'>만장일치가</word> 없었고, 그들의 파벌은 나뉘어 있었다.

sentences.english: He had to be careful not to <word id='_betray' class='word-eng-link'>betray</word> the trust of the few allies he had.
sentences.korean: 그는 그가 가진 몇 안 되는 동맹의 신뢰를 <word id='_betray' class='word-target-kr'>배신하지</word> 않도록 조심해야 했다.

sentences.english: He used a magnetic device to <word id='_bind' class='word-eng-link'>bind</word> the guard's hands.
sentences.korean: 그는 경비원의 손을 <word id='_bind' class='word-target-kr'>묶기</word> 위해 자기 장치를 사용했다.

sentences.english: The truth began to <word id='_blur' class='word-eng-link'>blur</word> the line between man and machine.
sentences.korean: 진실은 인간과 기계 사이의 경계를 <word id='_blur' class='word-target-kr'>흐리게 하기</word> 시작했다.

sentences.english: He had to <word id='_circumvent' class='word-eng-link'>circumvent</word> the AI's surveillance network.
sentences.korean: 그는 AI의 감시망을 <word id='_circumvent' class='word-target-kr'>우회해야</word> 했다.

sentences.english: His movements were <word id='_clumsy' class='word-eng-link'>clumsy</word> in the unfamiliar, high-tech environment.
sentences.korean: 익숙하지 않은 첨단 기술 환경에서 그의 움직임은 <word id='_clumsy' class='word-target-kr'>서툴렀다</word>.

sentences.english: His <word id='_conduct' class='word-eng-link'>conduct</word> had to be flawless to avoid detection.
sentences.korean: 탐지를 피하기 위해 그의 <word id='_conduct' class='word-target-kr'>행동은</word> 흠잡을 데 없어야 했다.

sentences.english: He needed to <word id='_conserve' class='word-eng-link'>conserve</word> his energy for the escape.
